Docs.param: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer>.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetAutomationIdCore() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the string that uniquely identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer>. This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetHelpTextCore() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the string that describes the functionality of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer>. This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText%2A>.
Docs.returns: The string describing the functionality of the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This string typically returns the same text that is provided in the tooltip for the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer GetLabeledByCore() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> that is targeted to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer>. This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A>.
Docs.returns: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"> for the element that is targeted by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For example, if the element is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A> method can retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> that is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
